languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс издает сдавленный стон, когда вы обхватываете его, но тут же обнимает вас в ответ.{/n} "Нет, не отпускай. Так лучше. Намного".

traits.locale_text: {n}Хейнрикс издает сдавленный стон, когда вы обхватываете его, но тут же обнимает вас в ответ.{/n} "Нет, не отпускай. Так лучше. Намного".

languages.text: {n}Heinrix lets out a choked moan when you hug him, but he immediately wraps his arms around you.{/n} "No, don't let go. This is better. Much better."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс издает сдавленный стон, когда вы обхватываете его, но тут же обнимает вас в ответ.{/n} "Нет, не отпускай. Так лучше. Намного".

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix lets out a choked moan when you hug him, but he immediately wraps his arms around you.{/n} "No, don't let go. This is better. Much better."
{n}Heinrix lets out a choked moan when you hug him, but he immediately wraps his arms around you.{/n} "No, don't let go. This is better. Much better."
{n}Heinrix lets out a choked moan when you hug him, but he immediately wraps his arms around you.{/n} "No, don't let go. This is better. Much better."
{n}Heinrix lets out a choked moan when you hug him, but he immediately wraps his arms around you.{/n} "No, don't let go. This is better. Much better."

languages.text: {n}当你抱住海因里希的时候，他发出了一声哽咽的呻吟，但随后立刻伸出双手，抱住了你。{/n}“不，不要松开手。这样好多了，真的好多了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix lets out a choked moan when you hug him, but he immediately wraps his arms around you.{/n} "No, don't let go. This is better. Much better."

traits.locale_text: {n}当你抱住海因里希的时候，他发出了一声哽咽的呻吟，但随后立刻伸出双手，抱住了你。{/n}“不，不要松开手。这样好多了，真的好多了。”

languages.text: {n}Heinrix suelta un gemido ahogado cuando le abrazas, pero inmediatamente te rodea con sus brazos.{/n} «No, no me suelte. Esto es mejor. Mucho mejor».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix lets out a choked moan when you hug him, but he immediately wraps his arms around you.{/n} "No, don't let go. This is better. Much better."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix suelta un gemido ahogado cuando le abrazas, pero inmediatamente te rodea con sus brazos.{/n} «No, no me suelte. Esto es mejor. Mucho mejor».

languages.text: {n}あなたがハインリックスを抱きしめると、ハインリクスはうめき声をあげた。だが、すぐに彼はあなたの身体に腕を回す。{/n}「いや、離さないでくれ。この方がいい。ずっといい」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix lets out a choked moan when you hug him, but he immediately wraps his arms around you.{/n} "No, don't let go. This is better. Much better."

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたがハインリックスを抱きしめると、ハインリクスはうめき声をあげた。だが、すぐに彼はあなたの身体に腕を回す。{/n}「いや、離さないでくれ。この方がいい。ずっといい」

languages.text: {n}Lorsque vous vous pressez contre lui, Heinrix étouffe un gémissement de douleur, mais alors que vous avez un mouvement de recul, il se hâte de vous serrer dans ses bras.{/n} « Non, restez. C'est mieux ainsi. Bien mieux. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix lets out a choked moan when you hug him, but he immediately wraps his arms around you.{/n} "No, don't let go. This is better. Much better."

traits.locale_text: {n}Lorsque vous vous pressez contre lui, Heinrix étouffe un gémissement de douleur, mais alors que vous avez un mouvement de recul, il se hâte de vous serrer dans ses bras.{/n} « Non, restez. C'est mieux ainsi. Bien mieux. »

languages.text: {n}Heinrix stöhnt deutlich auf, als du ihn umarmst, und erwidert die Umarmung.{/n} "Nein, lasst nicht los. Das ist besser. Viel besser."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix lets out a choked moan when you hug him, but he immediately wraps his arms around you.{/n} "No, don't let go. This is better. Much better."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix stöhnt deutlich auf, als du ihn umarmst, und erwidert die Umarmung.{/n} "Nein, lasst nicht los. Das ist besser. Viel besser."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, ona sarıldığında kısık bir sesle inlese de kollarını anında sana doluyor.{/n} "Hayır, bırakma. Böylesi daha iyi. Çok daha iyi..."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix lets out a choked moan when you hug him, but he immediately wraps his arms around you.{/n} "No, don't let go. This is better. Much better."
